Container.Name: Framerr
Container.Overview: Self-hosted homelab dashboard with real-time widgets, iframe tabs, and Plex SSO. Deep integration with Plex, Sonarr, Radarr, Overseerr, Tautulli, qBittorrent, SABnzbd, Glances, Unraid, and Uptime Kuma. Multi-user with per-user access control, notifications with Web Push, and encrypted secrets.
